last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 10
last_episode_to_air.overview: Claire and Eric have seemingly moved on with their lives, but a chance encounter brings new truths to light.

name: A Teacher
overview: Claire Wilson, a young teacher at a suburban Texas high school, begins an affair with her student, Eric Walker. But their relationship accelerates faster than anticipated and the permanent damage becomes impossible to ignore.
tagline: Power, abuse, and the damage it leaves.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: Claire starts her first day teaching at a new school and meets her students, including Eric, a senior in her AP English class.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: Eric gets caught for underage drinking and a new friend helps bail him out. Claire takes Eric on a field trip to a nearby college.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: Tensions arise as Claire and Matt explore pregnancy options. Claire chaperones the homecoming dance and Eric comes clean about his true feelings.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: Claire outlines the rules Eric must follow as their relationship takes a dramatic turn.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: Claire and Eric go away on a secret trip to celebrate his 18th birthday.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: As Claire's world begins to crumble, an uncertain Eric is pressed to reveal intimate details of his relationship.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: Eric tries to move on, but fallout from the affair continues to resurface in unexpected ways.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: Claire attempts to restart her life. However, not everyone is ready for her to turn the page.

episodes.name: Episode 9
episodes.overview: Claire and Eric separately hit their breaking points.

episodes.name: Episode 10
episodes.overview: Claire and Eric have seemingly moved on with their lives, but a chance encounter brings new truths to light.
